html: Praise springs from the hearts of all who experience Jehovah’s salvation, who perceive the bigger picture of his operation in their lives as their troubles finally blow over: “O Jehovah, you are my God; I will extol you by praising your name. For with perfect faithfulness you have performed wonders, things planned of old” ( Isaiah 25:1). Those who live by his law and word live to see his redemption that is founded on his atoning sacrifice for sin. Such acknowledge his merciful intervention: “O Jehovah, you bring about our peace; even all that we have accomplished you have done for us” ( Isaiah 26:12).
